pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit, Simulate and Diagnose Exponential-Family Random Graph Models to Egocentrically Sampled Network Data // Utilities for managing egocentrically sampled network data and a wrapper around the 'ergm' package to facilitate ERGM inference and simulation from such data. See Krivitsky and Morris (2017) doi:10.1214/16-AOAS1010.
